notes: This workout plan focuses on chest, triceps, and shoulders using a home gym setup with bench and dumbbells. It is designed for an intermediate level individual aiming to improve strength and muscle development.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: The bench press is a fundamental exercise for building upper body strength, particularly targeting the chest muscles.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: Incline bench press helps to emphasize the upper chest muscles and complements the regular bench press for a well-rounded chest workout.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Tricep dips are an effective bodyweight exercise for targeting the triceps. It can be done using a bench for added resistance.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Lateral raises are great for isolating and strengthening the side deltoid muscles, helping to improve shoulder width and definition.
